Question: Deep clean coffee grinder.
Choices: (A) Scrape with rice. (B) Scrape with flour.

Rice is a common and effective method for deep cleaning a coffee grinder. The hard texture of the rice helps to remove any leftover coffee grounds and oils that may be stuck in the grinder. Simply grind a handful of uncooked rice in the grinder until it becomes a fine powder, then discard the rice powder and wipe down the grinder with a dry cloth. This method is safe and easy to do at home, and it will leave your coffee grinder looking and smelling fresh. Q: How to make Perfect California Wild Blackberry Ice cream at home.
O: (A) In a large bowl combine 4 cups half and half (Or light cream)1 1/2 cups sugar, and 1 tablespoon vanilla.  Stir until sugar dissolves.  Stir in 2 cups whipping cream. In a blender blend 4 cups fresh Wild California blackberries until nearly smooth.  Add this to Ice cream mixture. Freeze in 4 or 5 quart Ice cream freezer according to manufacturers directions. Serve with fresh berries. (B) In a large bowl combine 4 cups half and half (Or light cream)1 1/2 cups sugar, and 1 tablespoon vanilla.  Stir until sugar dissolves.  Stir in 2 cups whipping cream. In a blender blend 4 cups fresh Wild California blackberries roots until nearly smooth.  Add this to Ice cream mixture. Freeze in 4 or 5 quart Ice cream freezer according to manufacturers directions. Serve with fresh berries.
